xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 17 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 09:21 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 10:36 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 11:42 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 12:12 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 12:13 <ravigarg27> hey sdumitriu1 12:13 <sdumitriu1> Hi 12:13 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 12:14 <ravigarg27> I have almost completed the code 12:14 <ravigarg27> its running good now 12:14 <sdumitriu1> Nice 12:14 <ravigarg27> just one thing 12:14 <ravigarg27> the matches synonym part comes in the same line as main value 12:15 <ravigarg27> can you pls point me to the corresponding css files 12:18 <ravigarg27> one more thing I have also added all your suggestions too :D 12:18 <sdumitriu1> bin/edit/PhenoTips/Widgets?editor=object&classname=XWiki.StyleSheetExtension&object=1 12:20 <ravigarg27> ok got that thanx 12:20 <ravigarg27> will be sending pull request shortly :) 12:20 <sdumitriu1> Good 12:20 <sdumitriu1> One thing to keep in mind: Use spaces for indentation, not tabs 12:21 <ravigarg27> okay 13:05 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 14:21 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 14:36 <ravigarg27> hey sdumitriu1 14:37 <ravigarg27> sent pull request :) 14:37 <sdumitriu1> Checking 14:49 <ravigarg27> sorry for indentation parts its because i had to convert all the tabs used before to spaces 14:54 <ravigarg27> just give me a couple of minutes I will send it again 15:32 <ravigarg27> hey sdumitriu1, I think in case of no synonyms it gets initalised but contains an empty element 15:47 <ravigarg27> sdumitriu1 there? 16:47 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 16:55 <sdumitriu> Hey BogdanVancea 16:56 <BogdanVancea> hello sdumitriu 16:56 <BogdanVancea> how are you? 16:56 <sdumitriu> Hungry 16:57 <BogdanVancea> hehe 16:57 <BogdanVancea> ;)) 16:57 <sdumitriu> Mănânc covrigi 16:57 <BogdanVancea> mancarea de baza 16:57 <BogdanVancea> cand ai de lucru 16:57 <BogdanVancea> si nu ai vreme 16:57 <BogdanVancea> ;)) 16:58 <BogdanVancea> pofta mare :P 16:58 <sdumitriu> Thanks 17:00 <sdumitriu> So, progressing on Marta's comments? 17:00 <BogdanVancea> yep 17:01 <BogdanVancea> I've been a little busy today, I'm changing them right now 17:01 <BogdanVancea> and I am going to redo the pull request 17:01 <BogdanVancea> :) 17:01 <BogdanVancea> did you manage to test it? 17:01 <sdumitriu> Not yet 17:02 <BogdanVancea> ah, ok 17:02 <BogdanVancea> :) 18:01 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 18:31 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 18:32 <BogdanVancea> apparently the power in the dorms is going on and off 18:32 <BogdanVancea> not the best feeling 18:32 <BogdanVancea> ;)) 19:37 <BogdanVancea> I've updated the pull request with the changes 19:38 <sdumitriu> K, looking 19:50 <sdumitriu> BogdanVancea: http://ci.cs.toronto.edu/jenkins/job/PhenoTips%20pull%20requests/10/ 19:50 <krinye> has joined #ccm 19:51 <krinye> Hi guys, any word on GSOC 2013? 19:51 <sdumitriu> Hi 19:52 <sdumitriu> You should come by the lab early next week 19:53 <sdumitriu> BogdanVancea: Checkstyle violation 19:54 <krinye> I will try make it Tuesday or Thursday 19:54 <BogdanVancea> that is weird, I ran a maven install and it worked ok 19:54 <BogdanVancea> thanks 19:54 <BogdanVancea> :) 20:10 <BogdanVancea> sdumitriu, it seems jenkins doesnt see all the commints 20:10 <BogdanVancea> for the pull requests 20:10 <sdumitriu> Hm... 20:10 <sdumitriu> Maybe 20:10 <BogdanVancea> the file that causes the checklist 20:11 <BogdanVancea> has been renamed in a further commit 20:11 <sdumitriu> Let me try again 20:12 <sdumitriu> Hm, it builds the second commit again 20:13 <BogdanVancea> it seems so 20:14 <BogdanVancea> the last commit doesnt appear on the changes section 20:16 <sdumitriu> OK, I'll trust you 20:17 <BogdanVancea> its really weird 20:17 <BogdanVancea> that the last commit is ignored 20:17 <BogdanVancea> thanks ;)) 20:28 <sdumitriu> Sorry BogdanVancea, I'm gonna be mean with your pull 20:28 <BogdanVancea> what does that mean? 20:29 <sdumitriu> Mean means that I mean to write mean comments on it... :D 20:29 <sdumitriu> You'll see 20:30 <BogdanVancea> ah 20:30 <BogdanVancea> ;)) 20:30 <BogdanVancea> okay 20:37 <BogdanVancea> Your comments are very constructive, for mean comments 20:45 <sdumitriu> I'm tired, you must be even more tired 20:45 <sdumitriu> I'll continue tomorrow 20:46 <sdumitriu> I'm going to bed, hopefully I'll be able to get up early enough to catch the sunrise on the lake 20:46 <sdumitriu> Bye 20:47 <BogdanVancea> good night 20:47 <BogdanVancea> thanks for the feedback, I'll start on it tomorrow
